meta.description: The MOE Li Font, a clerical Chinese font by the Ministry of Education, ROC (Taiwan)

license.fullName: Creative Commons Attribution-No Derivative Works v3.00

meta.long_description:
The MOE Li Font is a li (clerical srcipt) font
provided by
the Midistry of Education, Republic of China (Taiwan).
It currently includes 4,808 Chinese characters.
The clerical script (lishu) is an archaic style of Chinese calligraphy.
meta.name: eduli
